name: repo-blueprint
description: Boilerplate repository template to jumpstart development with professional structure and community standards

scripts.setup: echo 'Setting up repository template...' && npm run validate
scripts.validate: npm run validate:structure && npm run validate:docs
scripts.validate:structure: echo 'Validating repository structure...' && test -d .github && test -d assets && test -d docs
scripts.validate:docs: echo 'Validating documentation...' && test -f README.md && test -f LICENSE && test -f docs/CONTRIBUTING.md
scripts.check:links: echo 'Checking documentation links...' && grep -r 'http' docs/ README.md || true
scripts.generate:toc: echo 'Generate table of contents for documentation'
scripts.template:init: echo 'Initialize new project from template' && npm run setup
scripts.template:clean: echo 'Clean template-specific files for new project'
scripts.precommit: npm run validate && npm run lint:md
